section.title: Viewing the Server, Audit, and Production Logs
section.para: The server and audit logs roll over daily. The previous logs are stored as zipped files in the /var/www/miq/vmdb/log folder. The current logs can be easily viewed and downloaded from the ConfigureConfiguration, then click on the Diagnostics accordion.
Use the server log to see all actions taken by the server including communication with the SmartProxy and tasks.
